metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10371 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The TIFFWriteDirectoryTagCheckedRational function in tif_dirwrite.c inLibTIFF 4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(assertion failure and application exit) via a crafted TIFF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10371` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.8').
